channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 19:42 Air alert in Mykolaiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 19:42 Air alert in Mykolaiv region. Follow further messages. #Mykolaiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:08 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
